name: Anima Indekos
description:
General description

Anima Indokos is a fantasy simulation game that can indirectly inspire players in terms of managing coins, energy, and time. This game takes an example from the life of "boarding children" who experience various kinds of limitations, busyness, and other problems that are often faced during their time as students. So from these limitations, busyness, and problems, this is the challenge in this game.

Game with three-dimensional graphics. The genre of Life Simulation and survival strategy. Type of Open World Game where players can explore the world freely. RPG category.

Character Story

This game tells the story of a student, named Vivin, who has problems with limitations due to parents who find it difficult to pay for her college life. Therefore, she decided to be able to live independently without burdening her parents. Every day, she tries to make ends meet for her college needs. It is undeniable that she must also find additional income to meet her daily needs.

Available Platform: Android OS 6.0 or above and Windows

*This game is in development
